name: Edric the Scribe
setup: Someone is resting by the path.
readaloud: A curious human scribe greets you. "Well met, travelers!"
description: This curious human scribe born to merchants or artisans. Their parents were sailors. In their youth, they lost someone close. They befriended a traveling merchant or minstrel who greatly influenced them. At one point, they caused suffering through inaction, motivated by money. Now they are searching for a lost relative.

name: Dagnal the Hunter
setup: A person emerges from the mist.
readaloud: A cautious dwarf hunter greets you. "Hail, adventurers!"
description: This cautious dwarf hunter lost their parents at a young age. In their youth, they had an unremarkable childhood. They had a significant romantic relationship who greatly influenced them. At one point, they publicly embarrassed someone, motivated by justice. Now they are looking for employment.

name: Immeral the Hunter
setup: You hear someone calling out for help.
readaloud: A talkative half-elf hunter greets you. "Good day to you!"
description: This talkative half-elf hunter lost their parents at a young age. In their youth, they was a victim of bullying in youth. They knew an athletic or competitive person who greatly influenced them. At one point, they stole something valuable, motivated by religion. Now they are looking for employment.

name: Dench the Craftsperson
setup: A figure approaches on the road ahead.
readaloud: A talkative half-orc craftsperson greets you. "Good day to you!"
description: This talkative half-orc craftsperson born to merchants or artisans. Their parents were serfs/peasants. In their youth, they was imprisoned for a crime. They knew someone in the criminal underworld who greatly influenced them. At one point, they caused suffering through inaction, motivated by love. Now they are fleeing from trouble.

name: Delia the Scholar
setup: A traveler waves to you from the roadside.
readaloud: A cowardly human scholar greets you. "Well met, travelers!"
description: This cowardly human scholar born to merchants or artisans. Their parents were artisans. In their youth, they was imprisoned for a crime. They knew an athletic or competitive person who greatly influenced them. At one point, they caused suffering through inaction, motivated by justice. Now they are visiting family in Otari.

name: Dagnal the Soldier
setup: A person emerges from the mist.
readaloud: A friendly dwarf soldier greets you. "Well met, travelers!"
description: This friendly dwarf soldier lost their parents at a young age. In their youth, they was betrayed by a trusted friend or family member. They was influenced by a holy person who greatly influenced them. At one point, they stole something valuable, motivated by money. Now they are visiting family in Otari.

name: Shandri the Craftsperson
setup: You hear someone calling out for help.
readaloud: A cheerful half-elf craftsperson greets you. "Good day to you!"
description: This cheerful half-elf craftsperson was born to privilege among the nobility. Their parents were yeomen. In their youth, they survived a raid on their settlement. They knew someone in the criminal underworld who greatly influenced them. At one point, they failed someone who depended on them, motivated by love. Now they are searching for a lost relative.

name: Delia the Merchant
setup: You hear someone calling out for help.
readaloud: A secretive human merchant greets you. "Greetings, friends!"
description: This secretive human merchant born to merchants or artisans. Their parents were soldiers. In their youth, they ran with a rough crowd. They befriended a traveling merchant or minstrel who greatly influenced them. At one point, they lied to further their goals, motivated by justice. Now they are running from the law.

name: Bree the Healer
setup: A person emerges from the mist.
readaloud: A brave half-elf healer greets you. "Greetings, friends!"
description: This brave half-elf healer was born to privilege among the nobility. Their parents were clergy. In their youth, they had an unremarkable childhood. They knew someone in the criminal underworld who greatly influenced them. At one point, they caused suffering through inaction, motivated by justice. Now they are seeking adventure.

name: Caelynn the Healer
setup: A traveler waves to you from the roadside.
readaloud: A friendly elf healer greets you. "Greetings, friends!"
description: This friendly elf healer raised by another family. Their parents were merchants. In their youth, they was betrayed by a trusted friend or family member. They was close to a family member who greatly influenced them. At one point, they lied to further their goals, motivated by family. Now they are fleeing from trouble.

name: Thamior the Entertainer
setup: A traveler waves to you from the roadside.
readaloud: A humble half-elf entertainer greets you. "Greetings, friends!"
description: This humble half-elf entertainer raised by another family. Their parents were sailors. In their youth, they was mentored by a skilled teacher. They was influenced by a holy person who greatly influenced them. At one point, they failed someone who depended on them, motivated by pressured. Now they are running from the law.

name: Keth the Messenger
setup: A figure approaches on the road ahead.
readaloud: A brave half-orc messenger greets you. "Greetings, friends!"
description: This brave half-orc messenger was born to privilege among the nobility. Their parents were entertainers. In their youth, they survived a raid on their settlement. They had a significant romantic relationship who greatly influenced them. At one point, they publicly embarrassed someone, motivated by religion. Now they are running from the law.

name: Boddynock the Innkeeper
setup: Someone is resting by the path.
readaloud: A cheerful gnome innkeeper greets you. "Good day to you!"
description: This cheerful gnome innkeeper born to merchants or artisans. Their parents were clergy. In their youth, they took a life at a young age. They had a wise teacher who greatly influenced them. At one point, they failed to keep an important oath, motivated by pressured. Now they are visiting family in Otari.

name: Keth the Healer
setup: A figure approaches on the road ahead.
readaloud: A talkative half-orc healer greets you. "Greetings, friends!"
description: This talkative half-orc healer raised by another family. Their parents were serfs/peasants. In their youth, they was mentored by a skilled teacher. They knew someone in the criminal underworld who greatly influenced them. At one point, they failed someone who depended on them, motivated by family. Now they are fleeing from trouble.

name: Dench the Messenger
setup: You hear someone calling out for help.
readaloud: A humble half-orc messenger greets you. "Good day to you!"
description: This humble half-orc messenger born to merchants or artisans. Their parents were sailors. In their youth, they was kidnapped and later escaped. They knew someone in the criminal underworld who greatly influenced them. At one point, they caused suffering through inaction, motivated by jealousy. Now they are visiting family in Otari.

name: Erevan the Entertainer
setup: A traveler waves to you from the roadside.
readaloud: A quiet elf entertainer greets you. "Well met, travelers!"
description: This quiet elf entertainer grew up among peasants, working the land. Their parents were serfs/peasants. In their youth, they took a life at a young age. They befriended a traveling merchant or minstrel who greatly influenced them. At one point, they lied to further their goals, motivated by love. Now they are running from the law.

name: Shump the Farmer
setup: You hear someone calling out for help.
readaloud: A confident half-orc farmer greets you. "Hail, adventurers!"
description: This confident half-orc farmer born to merchants or artisans. Their parents were serfs/peasants. In their youth, they was a victim of bullying in youth. They had a wise teacher who greatly influenced them. At one point, they stole something valuable, motivated by pressured. Now they are seeking adventure.

name: Fiona the Messenger
setup: A person emerges from the mist.
readaloud: A talkative human messenger greets you. "Good day to you!"
description: This talkative human messenger raised by another family. Their parents were serfs/peasants. In their youth, they grew up during wartime. They was influenced by a holy person who greatly influenced them. At one point, they caused suffering through inaction, motivated by pressured. Now they are running from the law.

name: Baern the Guard
setup: You hear someone calling out for help.
readaloud: A secretive dwarf guard greets you. "Good day to you!"
description: This secretive dwarf guard was born to privilege among the nobility. Their parents were yeomen. In their youth, they attended a private academy. They knew someone in the criminal underworld who greatly influenced them. At one point, they lied to further their goals, motivated by jealousy. Now they are fleeing from trouble.

name: Shump the Messenger
setup: A person emerges from the mist.
readaloud: A quiet half-orc messenger greets you. "Hail, adventurers!"
description: This quiet half-orc messenger grew up among peasants, working the land. Their parents were thieves. In their youth, they ran with a rough crowd. They was close to a family member who greatly influenced them. At one point, they stole something valuable, motivated by justice. Now they are on a pilgrimage.
